content:
Findings: Common Themes

  • Event Consumer(s) and Event Producer(s)

  • Intermediary “channel” abstraction

    • Queues, Topics, Items, Events, Push, Pull

  • QoS

    • privacy, authentication, authorization, latency

  • Variants

    • durable, once, at-least-once, at-most-once, maybe

  • Event subsystem is not unique to Printing

    • No need to invent a print-specific mechanism
    • Only events semantics, groupings, and optimizations are unique
